Explanation: Washington Senators, active through 1960, relocated to become the Minnesota Twins
Milwaukee Braves, active through 1965, relocated to become the Atlanta Braves
Kansas City Athletics, active through 1967, relocated to become the Oakland Athletics
Seattle Pilots, active through 1969, relocated to become the Milwaukee Brewers
Washington Senators, active 1961-1971, relocated to become the Texas Rangers
Montreal Expos, active through 2004, relocated to become the Washington Nationals
